message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to consider that?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $7800? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I can afford it.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. How about we meet at $8200? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7500, but that's as high as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
